t: Grow your online business with Amazon Native Brands
s: Amazon Native Brands (ANB) are brands explicitly created to sell new products through the marketplace. They use Amazon as their primary and almost only sales channel, focusing their efforts on improving their positioning and reputation within this marketplace.

s: July 2, 2024 - Holding companies and well-financed new Amazon aggregators alike are snapping up beauty and wellness sold exclusively on the platform. But growing them within and beyond the Amazon ecosystem will be challenging.
